original_text: Which was the son of Saruch, which was the son of Ragau, which was the son of Phalec, which was the son of Heber, which was the son of Sala,
korean_text: 그 위는 스룩이요 그 위는 르우요 그 위는 벨렉이요 그 위는 헤버요 그 위는 살라요

sentences.original_text: Which was the son of Saruch,
which was the son of Ragau,
which was the son of Phalec,
which was the son of Heber,
which was the son of Sala.
